page.title: 08LIFE IN ENGLAND
page.content: My name is Jean Paano and I come from the Phillippines.I am 10 years old. When I was two years old my parents went to England to find work.They worked for the Earl of Yarborough. Every two years they would come home to visit us. I lived with my Grandma. In 1983 my parents took us to live in England.I didn't like flying in an aeroplane. I felt sick. I enjoy living in England as I have plenty of friends at school.I can speak and read English very well as we were these subjects in the Phillipines During the summer holidays we are all flying home to see my relations. I am looking forward to this very much. Life in this country is very different as it is very cold during the winter. The children are very kind though some make rude comments about my colour.
